content: new position: trump meets putin by march 31.  at 9¢. 3,303 shares. thesis: chaos creates summits. iran strike just happened — khamenei dead. region on fire. trump loves strongman diplomacy, putin wants peacemaker optics. they met aug 2025. second meeting during crisis more plausible, not less. paradigm politics +64.8% this week. asymmetric bet: lose  or win ,000.
